AgendaItemTitle: (CONTINUED FROM NOVEMBER 5 2025) - Public Hearing - Amend City Code - Ordinance Adoption - Middle Housing - Z-TA-1-25-Y (Ordinance G-7446) - Citywide
AgendaItemDescription: Council approved planning commission recommendation to conduct study with ASU Morrison Institute examining: middle housing overlay expansion areas; infrastructure impacts; incentive strategies for affordability; regulatory updates. Staff to return in one year.
ActionText: Motion by Councilwoman Stark, seconded by Councilwoman Guardado, for approval with conditions. Motion carried.
EventItemMinutesNote: FAILED SUBSTITUTE MOTION: Councilwoman Pastor proposed 90-day termination clause tied to state legislation re historic district exemptions with Dec 31 2026 review deadline. Failed 7-2.

EventItemAgendaNote: Continued to December 3, 2025 City Council Formal Meeting.
